general.headline: Purpose Investments Launches USD ETF Series for Its Purpose Global Bond Fund
general.summary: TORONTO, Sept. 05, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- Purpose Investments Inc. ( "Purpose Investments" ) today announced the launch of a new USD ETF series for its fixed income fund, Purpose Global Bond Fund ( the "Fund" ) .
